name: Ailurophile
description:
A distress signal gone wrong causes an alien life form to board your ship, now left with no other choice you must find a way to escape the ship with your life and find your owner. (Cute, short horror game)

This is a little demo project I was working on so it still has a very tweaks to be fixed,  that'll surely be updated sooner than later.

I hope to one day flesh it out more but for now this will have to do! :) 

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Space - continue dialogue 

E - interact with items - (paws indicate some of the objects 

ESC - To return to menu and escape game

Credits:
